byline.contributor: Mike Isaac contributed reporting from Austin, Tex.

abstract: Facebook announces change to its Messenger app that will allow users to easily send each other money; Facebook's size and imprimatur make it likely that new system will send waves in nascent market for so-called peer-to-peer payments.
lead_paragraph: The feature will at first be limited to people who are Facebook friends, but Wall Street expects that such transactions will become a big business.

headline.main: Facebook Announces a Payments Feature for Its Messenger App
headline.print_headline: Facebook to Introduce Payments in Messages

snippet: The feature will at first be limited to people who are Facebook friends, but Wall Street expects that such transactions will become a big business.
